body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Germany. Married to Hannah Harry Sunthimer. Father of Esther Sunthimer, Caroline Sunthimer, Jacob Sunthimer, Adeline Sunthimer, Sallie Sunthimer, and Rosa Sunthimer. Merchant in Nelson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1860.
